# GET /v1/betaGroups/{id}/relationships/betaRecruitmentCriterionCompatibleBuildCheck | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

-  GET /v1/betaGroups/{id}/relationships/betaRecruitmentCriterionCompatibleBuildCheck 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/betaGroups/{id}/relationships/betaRecruitmentCriterionCompatibleBuildCheck

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-betaGroups-_id_-relationships-betaRecruitmentCriterionCompatibleBuildCheck#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/betaGroups/{id}/relationships/betaRecruitmentCriterionCompatibleBuildCheck
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-betaGroups-_id_-relationships-betaRecruitmentCriterionCompatibleBuildCheck#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-betaGroups-_id_-relationships-betaRecruitmentCriterionCompatibleBuildCheck#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[BetaGroupBetaRecruitmentCriterionCompatibleBuildCheckLinkageResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/betagroupbetarecruitmentcriterioncompatiblebuildchecklinkageresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-betaGroups-_id_-relationships-betaRecruitmentCriterionCompatibleBuildCheck#see-also)

### [Getting Beta Group Information](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-betaGroups-_id_-relationships-betaRecruitmentCriterionCompatibleBuildCheck#Getting-Beta-Group-Information)

[`List Beta Groups`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-betagroups)Find and list beta groups for all apps.[`Read Beta Group Information`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-betagroups-_id_)Get a specific beta group.[`Read the App Information of a Beta Group`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-betagroups-_id_-app)Get the app information for a specific beta group.[`GET /v1/betaGroups/{id}/relationships/app`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-betagroups-_id_-relationships-app)[`Read metrics for beta testers in a beta group`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-betagroups-_id_-metrics-betatesterusages)Get beta tester usage metrics for a beta group.[`Read recruitment criteria for a beta group`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-betagroups-_id_-betarecruitmentcriteria)Get the recruitment criteria information for a specific beta group.[`GET /v1/betaGroups/{id}/relationships/betaRecruitmentCriteria`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-betagroups-_id_-relationships-betarecruitmentcriteria)[`Read build compatibilty for a beta group`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-betagroups-_id_-betarecruitmentcriterioncompatiblebuildcheck)Get the build compatibilty information for a specific beta group.
